resources.string: CHECK WHETHER YOU HAVE CORONAVIRUS OR NOT. PLEASE ENTER YOUR DETAILS SO THAT A MEDICAL TEAM CAN COME TO HELP YOU.
App Developed by Shubhank Singhal (Dedicated to combat Covid-19 Pandemic). An initiative of the Graphic Era University.
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND MEDICAL WELFARE, UTTARAKHAND
MANUAL FOR ADVISORY OF CITIZENS DURING LOCKDOWN
